name: BEER
description:
You will play as BEER in an action/adventure/platformer/runner that will push you to the brink with a challenge worthy of the old school.

But who is BEER...?

A world-renowned, legendary hero with a career of success in some of the most dangerous and critical missions the world has seen...

That's the man the world knows...but I know BEER...and there's a story to be told to find out how the scrawny, meek Mike I knew became the "Amazing" BEER...

....I'm going to make him tell that story and you are going to help me.

AWESOME FEATURES:
- Great music
